title: Ticket #3050: Once MODIFY_REQUEST_EXPR_ Fails the machine will no longer accept jobs
description:
If for whatever reason a job fails on MODIFY_REQUEST_EXPR_ to split it will no longer accept any jobs an get caught in a fatal loop rendering machine useless until a restart.

To repro:

1. Create a dual pSlot config and give most of the memory to one of the pSlots. 

NUM_CPUS=16

SLOT_TYPE_1 = cpus=8 mem=10%
NUM_SLOTS_TYPE_1 = 1
SLOT_TYPE_1_PARTITIONABLE=TRUE
SLOT_TYPE_2 = cpus=8 mem=90%
NUM_SLOTS_TYPE_2 = 1
SLOT_TYPE_2_PARTITIONABLE=TRUE

2. Submit a large number of sleep jobs to *this personal condor.

3. Wait for the "Job no longer matches partitionable slot after MODIFY_REQUEST_EXPR_ edits, retrying w/o edits" log message then the machine will enter a spiral.
